description:
Browse our range of commercial folding & stacking tables suitable for indoor and outdoor use. Ideal for commercial premises such as cafes, pubs, hotels and bars to provide flexibility and space saving storage solutions. The folding tables here are available in different styles and great for venues that have a limited amount of space. We offer:
  • Traditional Wooden Tables,
  • Laminate Tables,
  • Glass Tables,
  • Teak, EZ Care & Werzalit Tables.
name: Folding & Stacking Tables
